title: Strengthening Web Development Practical Competencies: Mobile-Based Language Competency Short-Term Program for Industry Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language comprehension skills and familiarity with fundamental professional terminology
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze field-specific professional language patterns with 80% accuracy.
Learners can complete language practice missions at least five times a week using a mobile app.
Learners can complete practical language scenario projects collaboratively with peers using collaboration tools.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
